block.p: American League TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Placed 3B Vinny Castilla on the 15-day disabled list. Called up INF Bobby Smith from Durham of the International League. TEXAS RANGERS--Sent OF Jason McDonald outright to Oklahoma of the PCL. Claimed RHP Scott Randall off waivers from the Minnesota Twins and optioned him to Oklahoma. Transferred RHP Danny Kolb from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list. Signed RHP Greg Runser and assigned him to Pulaski of the Appalachian League. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Signed LHP Eric Stephenson, 2B Ulyses Davenport, RHP Scott Cavey and C Kurt Keene. Called up RHP Leo Estrella from Tennessee of the Southern League to Syracuse of the International League and RHP Scott Cassidy from Dunedin of the Florida State League to Tennessee.

American League TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Placed 3B Vinny Castilla on the 15-day disabled list. Called up INF Bobby Smith from Durham of the International League. Transferred RHP Danny Kolb from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list. Signed RHP Greg Runser and assigned him to Pulaski of the Appalachian League. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Signed LHP Eric Stephenson, 2B Ulyses Davenport, RHP Scott Cavey and C Kurt Keene. Called up RHP Leo Estrella from Tennessee of the Southern League to Syracuse of the International League and RHP Scott Cassidy from Dunedin of the Florida State League to Tennessee.
National League ATLANTA BRAVES--Recalled LHP John Rocker from Richmond of the International League.
National Basketball Association WASHINGTON WIZARDS--Named Leonard Hamilton coach and signed him to a five-year contract.

National Football League ARIZONA CARDINALS--Signed DB David Barrett to a three-year contract. CHICAGO BEARS--Signed LB Dustin Lyman to a three-year contract. DALLAS COWBOYS--Announced the retirement of FB Daryl Johnston. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Re-signed K Olindo Mare to a one-year contract. Waived WR Yatil Green. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Signed WR Sherrod Gideon to a three-year contract. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Signed S Zack Bronson to a one-year contract. Waived DT Bo Barzilauskas, DT James Brumbaugh, CB Drae Harris, S Tracy Hart, S B.J. Williams, OT Dustin Owen and LB Al Rice.

National Hockey League ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS--Agreed to terms with C Jarrett Smith on multiyear contract. BUFFALO SABRES--Announced they will not exercise their contract option on RW Rob Ray. CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS--Signed RW Ryan VandenBussche. COLORADO AVALANCHE--Signed D Ray Bourque to a one-year contract. FLORIDA PANTHERS--Signed RW Denis Shvidki. NASHVILLE PREDATORS--Signed D John Namestnikov and D Rory Fitzpatrick.
U.S. OLYMPIC COMMITTEE--Announced the resignation of Dr. Wade Exum, director of the drug control administration.

FRESNO STATE--Named Matt Brown men's swimming coach. HILBERT--Named Dale Bless women's volleyball coach. KENT--Announced the retirement of Judy Devine, associate athletics director, effective June 30. MUHLENBERG--Named Kristen Stuckel field hockey and women's lacrosse coach and Corey Goff assistant football coach. NEW MEXICO STATE--Named Elmer Chavez men's assistant basketball coach. NORTH CAROLINA-GREENSBORO--Promoted Jason Kinders to men's and women's assistant tennis coach, effective July 1. QUINNIPIAC--Named Ron Ogrodowicz assistant athletic director for athletic training. SOUTH CAROLINA--Announced the retirement of Harold White, athletic department academic support administrator. Named Tom Perry athletic department academic support administrator and Craig Curry associate athletic director and interim NCAA compliance coordinator. SYRACUSE--Announced basketball G Tony Bland is transferring to San Diego State. TEXAS-SAN ANTONIO--Named Elizabeth Dalton associate athletic director-senior woman administrator. WENTWORTH TECH--Announced the resignation Phuong Luong, men's volleyball coach.
